user.title: Add your Tuiss Smartblind.
user.description: Please make sure that you have connected to the Tuiss app before using in order to correctly set the top and bottom values. The MAC address can be found on the tag that came attached to your blind or on a label that is printed at the top of the blind, near to where the battery is attached.

confirm.title: Name your Tuiss Smartblind.
confirm.description: Please add a friendly name for your blind.

error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. This error should not be possible, if you get it please raise an issue.
error.unknown: Unknown error. Please try again. If you consistently get this error please raise an issue.
error.device_not_found: The device could not be found. Please ensure it is powered on and in range.
error.connection_timeout: The connection timed out after several retries. Please try again later.
error.invalid_host: Your mac address must be in the format XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX
error.invalid_name: Your name must be longer than 0 characters

abort.already_configured_by_discovery: This device has already been discovered. Please configure it through the discovered devices list.

data.blind_restart_position: Check for blind position on restart
data.blind_speed: How fast should the blind move to position

data_description.blind_orientation: Inverts the result of the 'Set_Blind_Position' action. Select this if using the action returns a value that is opposite to what you would expect e.g. 60% open instead of 40% open.
data_description.blind_restart_position: Fetch the blinds current position following a Home Assistant restart. Useful if you use the Smartview app or a remote control.
data_description.blind_restart_attempts: Connection attempts that will be made before timing out. Increase this if you find that you are getting dropped requests. Note: the distance between blinds and bluetooth proxies/dongles is the main cause for connection drop offs.
data_description.blind_favorite_position: The position (in percent, 0=closed, 100=open) that the blind will move to when the 'Go to Favorite Position' button is pressed.

error.blind_is_moving: The blind is currently moving. Please wait for it to stop before changing the speed.

get_battery_status.name: Get Battery Status
get_battery_status.description: Get the battery status for the Tuiss blinds selected

get_blind_position.name: Get Blind Position
get_blind_position.description: Get the current position of the blind for the Tuiss blinds selected

set_blind_position.name: Set Blind Position
set_blind_position.description: Set the position of the blind with single decimal point precision (0.0-100.0)

position.name: Position
position.description: Target position between 0.0 (Closed) and 100.0 (Open) with 1 decimal point accuracy)

set_blind_speed.name: Set Blind Speed
set_blind_speed.description: Set the speed of the blind motor

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: Target speed for the blind motor

simultaneous_blind_positioning.name: Simultaneous Blind Positioning
simultaneous_blind_positioning.description: Set the position of multiple blinds simultaneously. Multiple entities must be selected for this action to work. This action should only be used if you want blinds to move at the same time and have enough BT devices to handle the number of connections you want to make (e.g. 3 connections per esphome proxy).

position.name: Position
position.description: Target position between 0.0 (Closed) and 100.0 (Open) with 1 decimal point accuracy)

force_unlock.name: Force Unlock
force_unlock.description: Force unlock a blind that is stuck in a locked state

failed_set_position.message: {name} failed to set position with error {error}

device_locked.message: {name} is busy (locked). Please wait for current operation to finish.
